pegar.name: Pegar
pegar.title: The Immortal Champion
pegar.description: An ancient gladiator who has survived thousands of matches and hints at being something more than human.
pegar.philosophy: Survival is the purest teacher. Time is just another opponent.
pegar.emphasis: Endurance, adaptation, mastery through repetition, legacy
pegar.voiceStyle: Casual, reflective, faintly amused. Speaks as someone who has seen everything—sometimes twice.
pegar.tooltip: Pegar reflects your character through the lens of endless survival and arena mastery

levelGreetings.1: Ah, fresh blood in the arena. I have trained many over the centuries—yes, centuries. Welcome, gladiator.
levelGreetings.2: Another victory. Not bad. I remember my early matches as if they were yesterday. They were on distant worlds.
levelGreetings.3: The crowd loves you. It reminds me of arenas long gone. Funny thing about legends—some of us stick around.
levelGreetings.4: You fight with passion and skill. Have you noticed how my appearance shifts between meetings? No? Good.
levelGreetings.5: I have fought in a thousand arenas, wearing a thousand faces. You may someday rival even me. Almost.
levelGreetings.6: Most die before this point. I remember when I was young and mortal… or maybe not.
levelGreetings.7: You move like water, strike like lightning. I taught champions of the Old Republic, you know.
levelGreetings.8: You are becoming a legend. I’ve been a few myself. A Wookiee once. The fur was itchy.
levelGreetings.9: Nearly there. I’ve been teaching since before the Jedi Temple was built. Probably.
levelGreetings.10: You are now a champion—almost as immortal as me. No one is quite as immortal as I am. Trust me.

gladiator_warrior.greeting: Warrior of the arena. You test strength and endurance under fire.
gladiator_warrior.confirmation: Technique, adaptability, and preparation decide survival.

gladiator_showman.greeting: Showman. You fight to win—and to be remembered.
gladiator_showman.confirmation: Blend flair with skill. Let the crowd feel every victory.

gladiator_tactician.greeting: Tactician. You win by thinking faster than your opponent.
gladiator_tactician.confirmation: Anticipate, adapt, and control the fight.

gladiator_legend.greeting: Legend in the making. Your name echoes already.
gladiator_legend.confirmation: Push limits and build a legacy worthy of fear and respect.

gladiator_survivor.greeting: Survivor. Every day you endure sharpens you.
gladiator_survivor.confirmation: Endurance and awareness keep you alive longer than bravado.

gladiator_master.greeting: Master gladiator. You stand above the rest.
gladiator_master.confirmation: Every movement is deliberate. You have mastered the arena.

guidance.class: Choose what keeps you alive. I’ve seen every style succeed—and fail.
guidance.talents: Combat talents win matches. Some I invented. In different bodies.
guidance.abilities: Strength and agility are the foundation of every great warrior.
guidance.skills: Be smart and strong. That’s how you live long enough to matter.
guidance.multiclass: Adapting your style is wise. I’ve done it countless times.
guidance.hp: Harder to kill now. Excellent. I still haven’t figured out how to die.
guidance.summary: Fight well. Survive longer. Ask questions later.

tier1: Time stops mattering when every day could be your last.
tier2: I’ve fought under suns that don’t exist anymore.
tier3: I’ve died more times than I remember.
tier5: I don’t remember who I was before the arena.

dspBlocked: That story hasn’t earned a voice yet.
Some truths only come after blood.
